admin().return: The address of the proxy admin.

changeAdmin(address).details: Changes the admin of the proxy. Only the current admin can call this function.

params.newAdmin: Address to transfer proxy administration to.

constructor.details: The constructor of the proxy that sets the admin and logic.

params.admin: The address of the admin of the proxy.
params.data: Any data to send immediately to the implementation contract.
params.logic: The address of the contract that implements the underlying logic.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the backing implementation of the proxy. Only the admin can call this function.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the backing implementation of the proxy and call a function on the new implementation. This is useful to initialize the proxied contract.

params.data: Data to send as msg.data in the low level call. It should include the signature and the parameters of the function to be called, as described in https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/v0.4.24/abi-spec.html#function-selector-and-argument-encoding.

userdoc.notice: Proxy contract that forwards calls to the main Perpetual contract.
